::: {.column width="50%"}

## What We Built

An interactive explorer combining:

1. **Data table** with inline visualizations
2. **D3.js visualizations** - Regulatory Framework vs Public Services
3. **Custom explorer** - any metric vs any metric, colored by region or income

All client-side, real-time, responsive.
